recommendedText: When it's time to show, it's about showing off your home in the best possible way, make it easy for yourself and let the professionals clean! Of course, the customer satisfaction guarantee applies when you book from us.

FAQ.whyOrder: Why should I book show cleaning?
FAQ.whyOrderAnswer: A freshly cleaned and well-kept home gives a positive impression and helps potential buyers imagine living in the home. Professional cleaning can also emphasize the home's best features and make it more attractive, which can increase its market value and thus facilitate sales.
FAQ.whatIsIncluded: What is included in the service?
FAQ.whatIsIncludedAnswer: We clean all living rooms, kitchen and dining area, bathrooms and toilets, laundry room and entrance hall.
FAQ.whatHappensAfterOrderAnswer: After the booking is made, you will receive a booking confirmation via email and the selected performer will contact you to ensure that all information is correct and to determine the final details such as time and the like.

specialRequestText: Do not hesitate to call. We can solve most things that have to do with moving!
windowCleaningPopupText: Make sure your windows are sparkling clean! The cleaning company will contact you and confirm price and scope, nothing is binding at this stage. Price depends on the number of windows, their size and whether any glassed-in balcony/patio is to be included.
checkboxWindowCleaningText: I want to know more. Contact me!
infoBoxText:
After the booking, the supplier will tell you more about the options and prices, you then decide what you want. Nothing is binding.
Read more about what is included.< /strong>
summarySubHeader: All prices are after tax deduction
supplierWillContact: The cleaning company will contact you

CONFIRMATION.confirmationHeader: Smart of you to choose a quality assured
CONFIRMATION.orderMailText: You will receive a confirmation by email shortly, with information about what is happening now.
